name: Product
description: Any offered product or service. For example: a pair of shoes; a concert ticket; the rental of a car; a haircut; or an episode of a TV show streamed online.
title: Product

fields.name: manufacturer
fields.title: manufacturer
fields.description: The manufacturer of the product.

fields.name: sku
fields.title: sku
fields.description: The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU), i.e. a merchant-specific identifier for a product or service, or the product to which the offer refers.

fields.name: audience
fields.title: audience
fields.description: An intended audience, i.e. a group for whom something was created.

fields.name: mpn
fields.title: mpn
fields.description: The Manufacturer Part Number (MPN) of the product, or the product to which the offer refers.

fields.name: gtin8
fields.title: gtin8
fields.description: The GTIN-8 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. This code is also known as EAN/UCC-8 or 8-digit EAN. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

fields.name: reviews
fields.title: reviews
fields.description: Review of the item.

fields.name: isConsumableFor
fields.title: isConsumableFor
fields.description: A pointer to another product (or multiple products) for which this product is a consumable.

fields.name: offers
fields.title: offers
fields.description: An offer to provide this item—for example, an offer to sell a product, rent the DVD of a movie, perform a service, or give away tickets to an event.

fields.name: category
fields.title: category
fields.description: A category for the item. Greater signs or slashes can be used to informally indicate a category hierarchy.

fields.name: awards
fields.title: awards
fields.description: Awards won by or for this item.

fields.name: isAccessoryOrSparePartFor
fields.title: isAccessoryOrSparePartFor
fields.description: A pointer to another product (or multiple products) for which this product is an accessory or spare part.

fields.name: logo
fields.title: logo
fields.description: An associated logo.

fields.name: gtin14
fields.title: gtin14
fields.description: The GTIN-14 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

fields.name: gtin13
fields.title: gtin13
fields.description: The GTIN-13 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. This is equivalent to 13-digit ISBN codes and EAN UCC-13. Former 12-digit UPC codes can be converted into a GTIN-13 code by simply adding a preceeding zero. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

fields.name: gtin12
fields.title: gtin12
fields.description: The GTIN-12 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. The GTIN-12 is the 12-digit GS1 Identification Key composed of a U.P.C. Company Prefix, Item Reference, and Check Digit used to identify trade items. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

fields.name: material
fields.title: material
fields.description: A material that something is made from, e.g. leather, wool, cotton, paper.

fields.name: isSimilarTo
fields.title: isSimilarTo
fields.description: A pointer to another, functionally similar product (or multiple products).

fields.name: model
fields.title: model
fields.description: The model of the product. Use with the URL of a ProductModel or a textual representation of the model identifier. The URL of the ProductModel can be from an external source. It is recommended to additionally provide strong product identifiers via the gtin8/gtin13/gtin14 and mpn properties.

fields.name: color
fields.title: color
fields.description: The color of the product.

fields.name: isRelatedTo
fields.title: isRelatedTo
fields.description: A pointer to another, somehow related product (or multiple products).

fields.name: productID
fields.title: productID
fields.description: The product identifier, such as ISBN. For example: meta itemprop="productID" content="isbn:123-456-789".

fields.name: itemCondition
fields.title: itemCondition
fields.description: A predefined value from OfferItemCondition or a textual description of the condition of the product or service, or the products or services included in the offer.

fields.name: productionDate
fields.title: productionDate
fields.description: The date of production of the item, e.g. vehicle.

fields.name: brand
fields.title: brand
fields.description: The brand(s) associated with a product or service, or the brand(s) maintained by an organization or business person.

fields.name: releaseDate
fields.title: releaseDate
fields.description: The release date of a product or product model. This can be used to distinguish the exact variant of a product.
